title: [Large-Scale] Mathematics Teaching Method Design Utilizing a Smart Education Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented education program for pre-service and in-service teachers, applying a smart education framework to design mathematics curricula

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three-tier structure of the smart education framework: foundational technologies, support tools, and educational models.
Learners create at least two types of visual materials for math concepts using digital devices (e.g., tablets, LMS).
Learners can design an assessment system that provides personalized feedback through learner data analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
